column5: Includes carboxylic acids, esters, amides, etc.

column2: Number of carbonyl O, excluding COOH
column5: Excludes COOH but not COO- (assumes no formal charge) hydroxyls.  Includes esters, amides, etc.
Excludes COOH but not COO- (assumes no formal charge) hydroxyls
Aliphatic. Includes esters. Includes OMe groups on aromatic rings.
Includes primary, secondary hydrazines, carbazides, cyclic hydrazines.  Excludes hydrazones

column2: Number of nitroso groups, excluding NO2

column5: Both nitrogens must be attached to a C. Excludes azides.

column4: F or I or Cl or Br

column5: Aliphatic. Excludes sulfones, etc.  Includes SMe groups on aromatic rings.
Or charged form.  Excludes sulfonamides, sulfonyl Cl, etc..
Includes cyclic ureas, hydroxyureas, barbiturates, etc.

column2: Number of intramolecular H-bonds (o-OH and -C=O) + (o-NH2 and -COOH) + 8-OH/NH2 in quinolones
column4: c1([OH])c(C(=O))aaaa1 or c1([OH])c([NH2])aaaa1 or c1([NH2])c(C(=O)[OH])aaaa1 or n1c2c([OH])cccc2ccc1 or n1c2c([NH2])cccc2ccc1
column5: This is just a guess and may be missing other possible examples

column2: Number of unbranched alkanes  of at least 4 members (excludes halogenated alkanes)
Number of nitro benzene ring substituents
Number of nitro aromatic ring substituents
Number of non-ortho nitro benzene ring substituents
Number of readily oxidized moieties: thiols+dihydropyridines
Number of phenolic OH excluding ortho intramolecular Hbond substituents
Number of aliphatic hydroxyl groups excluding tert-OH
Number of benzodiazepines with no additional fused rings
Number of allylic oxidation sites excluding steroid dienone
Number of aryl methyl sites for hydroxylation
Number of tert-alicyclic amines (no heteroatoms, not quinine-like bridged N)
Number of alkyl carbamates (subject to hydrolysis)
Number of ketones excluding diaryl, a,b-unsat. dienones, heteroatom on Calpha
Number of N functional groups attached to aromatics
